content: आक्षिप्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Cast, thrown down. {@--2@} Overthrown, repulsed; <ls>Ratn. 4. 12.</ls> {@--3@} Seized, grasped, snatched away; <ls>V. 5. 5.</ls> {@--4@} Drawn, attracted, overpowered; कौतुक°, कुतूहल° <ls>U. 4</ls>; seduced, enticed; <ls>K. 281.</ls> {@--5@} Perplexed, distracted, bewildered; °मिव मे चेतः <ls>Ve. 2.</ls> {@--6@} Insulted, reviled, abused. {@--7@} Equal or equivalent to.
